name: Papaya and Blueberry Salad With Ginger-Lime Dressing
description: Though blueberries aren’t a tropical fruit, they go well with bright yellow or orange fruits from warm places. Papaya is high in potassium and contains enzymes that help break down proteins.
keywords: blueberries, papaya, dairy-free, gluten-free, halal, healthy, kosher, low cholesterol, low-fat, low-sodium, nut-free, vegetarian, side dish
recipeIngredient: 2 ripe papayas, peeled, seeded, and diced
1 tablespoon slivered fresh mint leaves, plus mint sprigs for garnish

recipeInstructions.text: Mix together the lime juice, honey and ginger in a large bowl. Add the fruit and slivered mint leaves, and toss together. Serve, garnishing each bowl with a sprig of fresh mint.
